sub_topic: Show that every group of order 16 is isomorphic to either the cyclic group C16, the dihedral group D8, or the non-abelian group of order 16.
message_1: How many non-isomorphic groups of order 16 are there, and provide a list of all possible subgroups for each group?
message_2:
There are 14 non-isomorphic groups of order 16. Here is a list of these groups along with their possible subgroups:

1. C16 (Cyclic group of order 16)
   Subgroups: {1}, C2, C4, C8, C16

2. C8 x C2
   Subgroups: {1}, C2, C4, C8, C2 x C2, C4 x C2, C8 x C2

3. C4 x C4
   Subgroups: {1}, C2, C4, C4 x C2, C4 x C4

4. C2 x C2 x C2 x C2
   Subgroups: {1}, C2, C2 x C2, C2 x C2 x C2, C2 x C2 x C2 x C2

5. D16 (Dihedral group of order 16)
   Subgroups: {1}, C2, C4, C8, C16, D4, D8, D16

6. Q16 (Quaternion group of order 16)
   Subgroups: {1}, C2, C4, C8, Q16

7. C4 x C2 x C2
   Subgroups: {1}, C2, C4, C2 x C2, C4 x C2, C4 x C2 x C2

8. D4 x C2
   Subgroups: {1}, C2, C4, D4, C2 x C2, D4 x C2

9. Q8 x C2
   Subgroups: {1}, C2, C4, Q8, Q8 x C2

10. (C2 x C2) x C4
    Subgroups: {1}, C2, C4, C2 x C2, C2 x C4, C2 x C2 x C4

11. C2 x D8
    Subgroups: {1}, C2, C4, C8, D8, C2 x C2, C2 x D8

12. C2 x Q8
    Subgroups: {1}, C2, C4, Q8, C2 x Q8

13. M16 (Modular group of order 16)
    Subgroups: {1}, C2, C4, C8, M16

14. D8 x C2
    Subgroups: {1}, C2, C4, C8, D8, D8 x C2

Note that the notation Cn represents a cyclic group of order n, Dn represents a dihedral group of order 2n, Qn represents a quaternion group of order n, and Mn represents a modular group of order n. The notation "x" represents the direct product of groups.
